title: Deeplinking to Fastball Video Landing page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the MLB.com Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the Fastball Video Landing Page url into the browser https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video
custom_expected: THEN the user is brought to the Fastball Video Landing Page.

title: Landing Page - Explore Topics
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball Video Landing Page https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video-fastball/.
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a topic on the explore topics subnav
custom_expected:
THEN the Landing Page is updated with videos from the selected category and the Title is updated.

Note: Topics can change based on forge content so not every topic will always be there. Need to just verify topics are clickable and don't return errors.

title: Landing Page: See More Button (Web)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball Video Landing Page https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video-fastball/.
custom_steps: WHEN the user scroll to the bottom of the fast ball landing page
custom_expected:
THEN the See More Button is enabled and can be clicked.
AND clicking SEE MORE button will load additional videos

title: Landing Page - Video Card Duration
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on fastball videos Most Popular videos page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the videos
custom_expected: THEN the user can see a pill icon to bottom right showing duration of the video

title: Landing Page - Video Card Thumbnail
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on fastball MOST POPULAR videos page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a video
custom_expected: THEN the user can view thumbnails for the most popular videos

title: Landing Page - Video Card Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Most Popular videos page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the videos
custom_expected: THEN the user can view the date under the video card/title

title: Landing Page - Server Side Rendering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the landing page
custom_steps: WHEN inspecting the page
custom_expected: THEN there should be a non-empty div with id mlb-video-app, h1 with text Most Popular, and list of non-empty items for landing page

title: Verify Playlist - Most Popular (large screen)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has selected a video and is on default playback page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing this page
custom_expected:
THEN the user can see Title "Most Popular" on right side
AND the user sees 10 videos (EXTRA LARGE/WEB screen size)

title: Verify Playlist - Most Popular Medium Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on video playback page on a medium screen
custom_steps: WHEN user views the right hand menu on page
custom_expected:
THEN user can see most popular videos
AND user can see 6 videos(MEDIUM screen size)

title: Verify Playlist - Most popular small screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on video playback page on XS/SM screen
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the right hand side
custom_expected:
THEN user can see Most Popular Videos
AND User can also see 4 videos(SM, XS screen size)

title: Verify Playlist - Video Cards
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the most popular videos list on right hand side
custom_expected: THEN user can see title, date, duration pill

title: Verify Playlist - Video Cards Link
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the most popular videos list on right hand side
custom_expected: THEN clicking the videos update the current video playing (URL slug changes based on video selected)

title: Verify Playlist - "See More" Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on default play back video page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on SEE MORE button on bottom of playlist
custom_expected: THEN user will see additional 10 videos (web)

title: Verify Playlist - See More Button (mobile/smaller screen)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on a mobile/smaller device
AND on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on SEE MORE link a the bottom of the most popular videos column
custom_expected: THEN user can see additional 4 videos load (XS/SM Screens)

title: Verify Playlist - See More Button (mobile/medium screen)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on a medium size device
AND on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on SEE MORE link a the bottom of the most popular videos column
custom_expected: THEN user can see additional 6 videos load (Medium Screen)

title: Verify Video Player - Play/Pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN player is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is playing a video
custom_expected: THEN user can see video player and you can play and pause video

title: Verify Video Player - Mute/Volume
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is playing a video
custom_expected: THEN user can mute or adjust the volume of the video playing

title: Verify Video Player - Full Screen Mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is playing a video
custom_expected: THEN user can click on full screen icon and make video full screen

title: Verify Video Player - Leave Behind
Video - Title, Date, Summary, Tags
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN user is playing a video
custom_expected:
THEN user can see Title and Summary exist under the video
AND user can view tags exist and can be clicked and directs to search page with that tag
If no tags exist, dont show tag field (possibly not ready)

title: Playback all clips on Video Playback Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on video playback page
custom_steps: WHEN current video finishes playing
custom_expected: THEN user should be shown the next video (with a screen before it that says "Next Video in 3...2...1..."

title: Closed Captions for all Sporty Bot clips only, not forge *ASG*
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a video page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the CC button
custom_expected:
THEN user can view closed captioning for the video
NOTE: this will only work on SportyBot videos (test URLs will be provided for this)
Video with CC:
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/video-fastball/judge-excited-to-watch-cole-pitch

title: Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Pinterest)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a video from videos page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on SHARE link
AND Selects a social media platform from the list (Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Pinterest)
custom_expected:
THEN user is prompted to login to social media platform

OR 

If user is already logged in to platform
THEN user is able to share the video to their social media.

title: Share URL
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a video from videos page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks share link
custom_expected: THEN user is able to copy the share link provided in popup window

title: Embed Code
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a video from videos page
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Share link
custom_expected: THEN user is able to view and copy the EMBED CODE

title: Server Side Rendering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the default playback page
custom_steps: WHEN inspecting the page
custom_expected: THEN there should be a non-empty div with id mlb-video-app, h1 and description for playback page

title: Random Video Renders Directly
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user goes directly to a video on the default playback page
custom_steps: WHEN on the page
custom_expected: THEN the page should return a 200 response

title: Twitter Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user goes directly to a video on the default playback page
custom_steps: WHEN on the page and inspecting the meta tags
custom_expected:
THEN there should be tags with these values 
<meta name="twitter:player" content="https://streamable.com/m/<slug>">
<meta name="twitter:player:width" content="560">
<meta name="twitter:player:height" content="315">

title: Streamable Playback
custom_preconds:
https://streamable.com/m/doby-s-solo-home-run-c1208509283
https://streamable.com/m/juan-soto-on-first-spring-homer-x2588
https://streamable.com/m/robert-stephenson-ball-to-adam-frazier-1z1tJd
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to each of the urls
custom_expected: THEN you can play back the video

title: Streamable Playback Home Feed
custom_preconds:
https://streamable.com/m/doby-s-solo-home-run-c1208509283/HOME
https://streamable.com/m/juan-soto-on-first-spring-homer-x2588/HOME
https://streamable.com/m/robert-stephenson-ball-to-adam-frazier-1z1tJd/HOME
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to each of the urls
custom_expected: THEN you can play back the video

title: Streamable Playback Away Feed
custom_preconds:
https://streamable.com/m/doby-s-solo-home-run-c1208509283/AWAY
https://streamable.com/m/juan-soto-on-first-spring-homer-x2588/AWAY
https://streamable.com/m/robert-stephenson-ball-to-adam-frazier-1z1tJd/AWAY
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to each of the urls
custom_expected: THEN you can play back the video

title: Batter Pitcher Matchup Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN player is on video playback page https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/video/ryan-yarbrough-induces-double-play?env=prod
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a play with a batter/pitcher matchup
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the batter and pitcher metadata

title: Click Batter Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN player is on video playback page https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/video/ryan-yarbrough-induces-double-play?env=prod
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the batter's name from the metadata
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to search results for that player's name

title: Click Pitcher Metadata
custom_preconds: GIVEN player is on video playback page https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/video/ryan-yarbrough-induces-double-play?env=prod
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the pitcher's name from the metadata
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to search results for that player's name

title: Header Search - Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the fastball page
custom_steps: WHEN user types a team into search box in header
custom_expected:
THEN user can select the team from dropdown of search results
AND user can view search results related to team
AND user can click on a video and it plays

title: Header Search - Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on fastball page
custom_steps: WHEN user enters a player name into search box
custom_expected:
THEN user can see search results related to search entry
AND user can select on a player to see video results for player

title: Header Search Type Ahead Cancel Search (web)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the fastball video landing page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts typing in the search field
AND then user clicks X inside the search box
custom_expected: THEN typed entry will clear out

title: Search Results - No Search Query (Desktop)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the MLB Search Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN a user has not entered any searches
custom_expected:
THEN show the advanced search page with text that says "Start Searching"
AND the header search box is present
AND the tabs and filters exist to the right

title: Header Search Type Ahead Search Entry
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the fastball video landing page
custom_steps: WHEN the user starts typing in the search field
custom_expected:
THEN the text being input by the user should replace the filler text

AND a maximum of 10 typeahead options should display below the text input

AND the user is given the option to tap a type ahead option to execute a search based on player or team

AND user can select a search result which results in loading video related to search result

title: Advanced Search - Tabs
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the search page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on filters
custom_expected:
THEN user is able to tab through the different filters (GAME, TEAMS, PLAYERS, PLAY OUTCOME)
AND filter options update depending on which tab the user is on

title: Advanced Search - Game Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on advanced search page and has selected Game from tabs
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects filters from one or all of the following:
-SEASON
-GAME TYPE
-DAY/NIGHT
custom_expected: THEN the user's selected filters are applied correctly

title: Advanced Search Play Outcome Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on advanced search page and has selected play outcome from tabs
custom_steps: WHEN user makes a selection from one or more filters available (Note to test each filter at least once and a combination of a few)
custom_expected: THEN user sees results for filters selected

title: Advanced Search Team Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on advanced search page
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the TEAMS tab and selects one or more of the filters
custom_expected: THEN user can view results for selected options

title: Advanced Search Player Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the advanced search page and player tab
custom_steps: WHEN user selects one or more of the filters available
custom_expected: THEN user can see search result for selected options

title: Advanced Search - Combo Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the advanced search page and can see search tabs
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a combination of filters from each of the tabs
custom_expected: THEN user can see search results for filters selected

title: Advanced Search - Multi-Select Buttons
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the fastball video advanced search page
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks/taps a button (e.g. buttons under Pitch Type)
custom_expected:
THEN the style should change from hollow to blue (changes back from to hollow when selected again)

AND are displayed in the header of the accordion item for the given field

title: Advanced Search - Type Ahead Multi-Select - Selecting a Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball Advanced Search Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a play from the typeahead
custom_expected:
THEN the text input should clear  

AND the player’s name should be displayed below the text input

AND an “X” should be displayed to the right of the player name (Users can click or tap that X to remove the player from the list)

AND if the player’s name is too long to fit on one line, it should be cut off with ellipses

AND a text input is placed at the top of the collapsible content container

AND filler text should be the same as the field name (ex: Batter Name)

AND a maximum of 12 autocomplete options should display as the user starts typing

title: Advanced Search - X out Filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball Advanced search page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user executes a search

AND clicks/taps the “X” on a search filter applied
custom_expected: THEN the search query should be adjusted to exclude that tag, and the new query should be executed

title: Advanced Search - Single Select Dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball advanced search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a  "Single Select Dropdown"
custom_expected:
THEN the selection should be displayed in blue in the dropdown

AND the selection should be displayed in blue at the top of the dropdown,  replacing the original field name

AND the selection should be displayed in the header of the collapsible component that contains the single select dropdown

title: Advanced Search - Server Side Rendering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the advanced search page
custom_steps: WHEN inspecting the page
custom_expected: THEN there should be a non-empty div with id mlb-video-app

title: Side Nav: Mobile : Explore Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a mobile device and on landing page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the explore button and opens the topics modal
custom_expected:
THEN user can see the links in the explore modal ob mobile devices and small screens (XS/SM screen sizes)

AND can verify that the X closes out the modal

title: Header Search: Search Entry Modal (Mobile)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the fastball video landing page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the search icon
custom_expected:
THEN the search modal should appear from the bottom of the screen

AND the text input field should be placed in the modal header (Filler text should be “search players and teams")

AND the blue “Advanced Search” button should be placed below the text input when search box is clicked into

title: Header Search Type Ahead and Cancel Search (Mobile)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a SM/M screen (mobile/ipad)
custom_steps:
WHEN user types in the search modal
AND 1. user clicks on X inside search box
OR 2. user clicks on X on modal
custom_expected:
THEN 1. click smaller x will clear out search entry
THEN 2. clicking X in the modal will close the modal

title: Advanced Search - Filter (Mobile)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball advanced search page
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the “Filter” button
custom_expected:
THEN an animated modal should appear from the bottom of the screen

AND the modal is titled "Advanced Search"

AND the “Clear All” button should be to the right of the title

AND the “Apply Filters” button appears locked to the bottom of the screen and other content should scroll under it.

title: Search Results - No Search Query (Mobile)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the MLB Search page on mobile/smaller screen
custom_steps: WHEN a user has not entered any searches
custom_expected:
THEN show the header search box with the text "Start Searching" (SM screen)
OR show header search box with text "Start Searching" and the advanced search tabs/filters showing on the right (MED screens)

title: Subnav - Type Ahead Search Entry - Header Behavior *MOBILE*
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the fastball video landing page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks search
AND searches for a player (example: Derek Jeter)
custom_expected: THEN the one result should be of that player searched

title: Add Clips to Playlist
Reorder Clips in Reel
Remove Clips from Reel
Add Titles to Clips (Profanity Filter)
My Clips Page - View All User Created Clips
Check Logged In / Logged Out State
Use Thumbnail from First Clip in Reel
Users can choose custom thumbnails for their clips from any point in their video (ASG)
Fastball outtro to encourage people to create clips (ASG)
Sort videos on my videos page (by created date) (ASG)
Add specific feed type of clips to your reel (ASG)
Delete user created clips (ASG)
Spanish
(Post-MVP)  Accessibility - Mobile Search Modal
(Post-MVP)  Accessibility - Desktop Search Entry
(Post-MVP) Search Results - No Results
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Fastball video search page
custom_steps: WHEN user enters letters that have no results
custom_expected: THEN the page displays 'no results' text

title: (Post-MVP) Search Results - Error State
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Fastball Video search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user executes a search with no results
custom_expected:
THEN show an error message to indicate what went wrong

AND the rest of the page can be the same as Search Results | No Results


e.g.
**We Made an Error**
There was an error when executing your search. Please refresh the page or try another query to get results.

title: (Post-MVP) Search Results - Basic Sorting  (Mobile)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the search page.
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Sort Button dropdown
custom_expected: THEN two options to sort is presented to the user: Date (Most Recent) and Date (Earliest).

title: (Post-MVP) Search Results - Basic Sorting (Desktop) - Clicking
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Sort Button dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the down arrow should flip to an up arrow and sorting options should display in a container below the button

title: (Post-MVP) Search Results - Basic Sorting (Desktop) - Hovering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers over a sort option within the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the background of that option should bee highlighted in grey

title: (Post-MVP) Search Results - Basic Sorting (Desktop) - Selecting Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an option from the Sort Button dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown should close and the selected option should replace the word “sort” in the dropdown header

AND if the user opens the dropdown again, the selected option should be displayed in blue unless a user selects another option

title: (Post-MVP)  Advanced Search - Date Picker to Filter Modal
Video Page Loads
custom_preconds: Go to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/video/
custom_steps: Verify the page returns a 200 response.
custom_expected: The page returns a 200 response.

title: Video Search Page Loads

custom_steps: Verify the page returns a 200 response.
custom_expected: The page returns a 200 response.

custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to add more than the allowed 5 clips
